description: Delete a lineup scenario lineup job schedule shift.
permissions: Requires permission to delete a lineup scenario lineup job schedule shift via the associated lineup scenario (LineupScenarioLineupJobScheduleShiftPolicy delegates destroy? to LineupScenario).
side_effects: Deletes a lineup scenario lineup job schedule shift.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (lineup scenario lineup job schedule shift ID). Requires --confirm to proceed.

flags.name: confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to confirm deletion.
